viewData.name: Samsung Q6F 49"-Class HDR UHD Smart QLED TV
viewData.short_description: Buy Samsung Q6F 49"-Class HDR UHD Smart QLED TV featuring UHD 3840 x 2160 LED Panel, HDR10 Support Motion Rate 120 for Reduced Motion Blur. Review Samsung Q6F Series
viewData.long_description: View content at four times the resolution of 1080p with the Samsung Q6F 49" Class HDR UHD Smart QLED TV. This TV has a 48.5 LED-backlit LCD display, and incorporates Motion Rate 120 technology to digitally enhance fast-moving images to reduce blur. It is compatible with HDR10 to provide a wider color gamut with compatible content and other equipment for more vivid images. The Q6F has built-in Wi-Fi connectivity to allow access to your favorite apps and Internet-based content, plus content sharing and screen mirroring with your other smart devices such as your smartphone or tablet. With four HDMI inputs, there are multiple options for connecting high-definition video sources. Three USB ports are also onboard for connecting multimedia peripherals like flash drives.
